function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of food and waterborne disease due to climate change.","Impact":"Higher levels of illness and potential death from food and waterborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Improving food and water safety measures, increasing public health awareness, and implementing climate-resilient agricultural practices.","Technologies":"Climate-resilient agricultural technologies, water purification systems, and disease surveillance systems.","People":"Population at risk of food and waterborne diseases, especially those in vulnerable communities.","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and agricultural stakeholders."},{"Description":"Exacerbation of socio-economic stress due to climate change.","Impact":"Increased socio-economic stress and inequality across society.","Mitigation":"Building resilience in various aspects of society, implementing social support programs, and creating climate adaptation strategies.","Technologies":"Social support platforms, climate modeling and prediction systems, and community-based resilience initiatives.","People":"General population, especially those in socio-economically vulnerable groups.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of access to accurate information leading to the spread of misinformation and acceptance of falsehoods.","Impact":"Misinformation hindering disease control efforts and contributing to public health risks.","Mitigation":"Improving access to accurate information, promoting critical thinking skills, and enhancing public education campaigns.","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, educational technology tools, and fact-checking systems.","People":"General population, especially those with limited access to information and education.","Owner":"Educational institutions, government, and media organizations."}]}
